Verses: 1 isravelin Raajaavaagiya Yerobeyaamin Irubaththezhaam Varushaththil, Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Amadhsiyaavin Kumaaran Asariyaa Raajaavaanaan.
2 avan Raajaavaagirapodhu Padhinaaru Vayadhaayirundhu, Aimbaththirandu Varusham Erusalemile Arasaandaan; Erusalem Nagaraththaalaana Avan Thaayin Per Ekkoliyaal.
3 avan Than Thagappanaagiya Amadhsiyaa Seydhapadiyellaam Karththarin Paarvaikku Semmaiyaanadhai Seydhaan.
4 medaigal Maaththiram Agatrappadavillai; Janangal Innum Medaigal Mel Baliyittuth Thoobankaattivandhaargal.

5 karththar Indha Raajaavai Vaadhiththadhinaal, Avan Than Marananaalmattum Kushtarogiyaayirundhu, Thaniththu Oru Veettile Vaasampanninaan; Raajaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yodhaam Aramanai Visaarippukkaaranaayirundhu, Dhesaththin Janangalai Nyaayam Visaariththaan.
6 asariyaavin Matra Varththamaanangalum, Avan Seydhavai Yaavum, Yoodhaavudaiya Raajaakkalin Naalaagamap Pusthagaththil Allavo Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
7 asariyaa Than Pidhaakkalode Niththiraiyadaindhapin, Avanai Dhaaveedhin Nagaraththile Avan Pidhaakkalandaiyile Adakkampanninaargal; Avan Kumaaranaagiya Yodhaam Avan Sthaanaththil Raajaavaanaan.
8 yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Asariyaavin Muppaththettaam Varushaththile Yerobeyaamin Kumaaranaagiya Sagariyaa Isravelinmel Samaariyaavile Aarumaadham Raajyabaarampanni,
9 than Pidhaakkal Seydhadhupola, Karththarin Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seydhaan; Isravelaip Paavancheyyappannina Nebaaththin Kumaaranaagiya Yerobeyaamin Paavangalai Avan Vittu Vilagavillai.
10 yaabesin Kumaaranaagiya Salloom Avanukku Virodhamaagak Kattuppaadupanni, Janaththin Munbaaga Avanai Vettik Kondrupottu, Avan Sthaanaththil Raajaavaanaan.
11 sagariyaavin Matra Varththamaanangal Isravel Raajaakkalin Naalaagamap Pusthagaththil Allavo Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
12 un Kumaarar Naalaam Thalaimuraimattum Israveludaiya Singaasanaththin Mel Veetriruppaargal Endru Karththar Yegoovode Sonna Vaarththai Idhudhaan; Appadiye Aayitru.
